content:
/>
VIII.iv.6.B.5.e
.
Paired Organs or Extremities and 38 U.S.C. 1151
Entitlement to compensation under
38 U.S.C. 1151
confers entitlement to compensation for paired organs or extremities under
38 U.S.C. 1160
if the criteria for entitlement are otherwise met.
Under
38 U.S.C. 1160
, the evaluations of paired organs or extremities are combined as if both were SC, even if one of the paired organs or extremities is compensable “as if” SC under
38 U.S.C. 1151
.
Reference
:  For more information on special considerations for paired organs and extremities, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 7.B.1
, and
VAOPGCPREC 73-1990
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B
